name: Augment 03 [Fall 2083]
description:
Augment is Shadowrun’s official magazine. This is a fully in-universe publication, and can be used in Shadowrun games as well as enjoyed by the casual reader.

Augment, Fall 2083. Politics and fashion are two sides of the same coin, and we have the goods to prove it! Discover if new dragons have been found while Poppy Yelverton dines with the one and only Njeri Anyango. Marques Reille sits down with fashion mogul and Wuxing Incorporated board member, Moag Chiang-Wu, to discuss corporate life and the needs of the people. Join Ariask Delallee from “Widow’s Walk” as she delves into the reality behind her fictional character’s fashion. Enjoy reviews of new products, clothing, tech, and so much more!

Augment your life with Augment magazine!
